    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>

            <entry>lens_es_20070518_3_0050400</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Búsqueda de palabras en un diccionario</string>
            <string language="en">Looking up words in a dictionary</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schauen herauf Wörter in einem Verzeichnis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Recherche des mots dans un dictionnaire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Olhar acima das palavras em um dicionário</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cercando le parole in un dizionario</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοίταγμα επάνω στις λέξεις σε ένα λεξικό</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Secuencia formada por Teoría, Atención a la diversidad y actividades didácticas sobre el uso del diccionario</string>
            <string language="en">Learning sequence which includes theory and learning activities on the use of the dictionary, which take cultural diversity into account.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Lengua Castellana y Literatura</string>
            <string language="en">Castilian and Literature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Diccionario</string>
            <string language="en">Dictionary</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erlernenreihenfolge, die Theorie und 
Lernenaktivitäten auf dem Gebrauch des Verzeichnisses einschließt, 
die kulturelle Verschiedenartigkeit in Betracht ziehen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ordre d'étude qui inclut la théorie et l'étude
sur l'utilisation du dictionnaire, qui tient compte de la diversité 
culturelle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Seqüência de aprendizagem que inclui a teoria e
as atividades de aprendizagem no uso do dicionário, que fazem exame 
da diversidade cultural no cliente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sequenza imparante che include la teoria e le 
attività imparanti sull'uso del dizionario, che prendono la 
diversità culturale in considerazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η ακολουθία εκμάθησης που περιλαμβάνει δραστηριότητες 
θεωρίας και εκμάθησης στη χρήση του λεξικού, που λαμβάνουν την 
πολιτιστική ποικιλομορφία λογαριάζει υπόψη.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Castilian und Literatur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verzeichnis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Castillan et littérature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dictionnaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Castilian e literatura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dicionário</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Castilian e letteratura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dizionario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καστιλιάνος και λογοτεχνία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λεξικό</string>
          </keyword>
